title: Enlarge Yer Slots
description: With only 16 places to put things, it is easy to run out of space. Go find any Street Spirit who sells Hardware and buy yourself a Generic Bag or a Bigger Bag.

paragraphs: With only 16 places to put things, it is easy to run out of space. Go find any Street Spirit who sells Hardware and buy yourself a Generic Bag or a Bigger Bag.
You got the bag: well done! I'm not even going to explain how you get things in it. I think you are smart enough to figure it out.
On second thought ... drag stuff in to it. (I worry about you, kid.)
Whatever ... here's some nice prizes for your trouble.
